mapper.insert: insert into material (MATERIALID, TITLE, IMAGEURL, SEASON, TEMPERATURE, CALORIES100G, EFFICACY, BUYGUIDE, TRIMGUIDE, STOREGUIDE) values (material_seq.nextval, #{title}, #{imageurl}, #{season}, #{temperature}, #{calories100g}, #{efficacy}, #{buyguide}, #{trimguide},#{storeguide})
mapper.select: select *from material order by materialid desc
mapper.update: update material set TITLE=#{title}, IMAGEURL=#{imageurl}, SEASON=#{season}, TEMPERATURE=#{temperature}, CALORIES100G=#{calories100g}, EFFICACY=#{efficacy}, BUYGUIDE=#{buyguide}, TRIMGUIDE=#{trimguide}, STOREGUIDE=#{storeguide} where MATERIALID=#{materialid}
